top_comments.comment: we will lose this country to fascism after 2022 when the complicit GOP can stop all jan.6 investigations.

comments_since_last_sample.body: 🇺🇸⚖I am a bit frustrated with Merrick Garland . He is to slow in getting things done.  I want him to be  more aggressive .  Bannon was referred to DOJ a few weeks ago and yet still NOTHING! EVEN after his referral  Steve Bannon continued to mock the commitee and doj and yet Still NOTHING is done. !!!! I don't get it!!!  .  We already know Bannon is a criminal who only happens to be  free because he got a pardon from our former idi*t in charge Donald Trump. Bannon is no good guy. So  lets get him NOW for contempt !!  🤦‍♀️⚖🇺🇸
